lol @ TtToker: a sanctimonious prick with an odd focus on the size of people's dicks, and a sad need to ham-fistedly suggest his own in notable in some way. 

Regardless of subject matter, he asserts, anyone that uses the word 'fuck' or expresses discernible anger is either a) stupid, or b) "not blessed" with a large penis (the obvious intended inference being that TtToker must be so calm and profanity-free because of his large, manly penis). 

Yeah, TtToker... It's everyone ELSE that's stupid. It's everyone ELSE whose actions are dictated by an unhealthy penis obsession. Thank goodness you could explain it all to us plebes in such an articulate, mellifluous fashion. How fortunate we are to receive the largesse of your personality disorder-free observations. Oh happy day. 

As for the clucking about your mental inferiors being silly for responding to spammers whose comments may be deleted, well... Aren't you just the cleverest little fellow? From the weary tone infused in the wording of your admonition, it must be terribly tiring for you to have to offer such benevolent instruction to your lessers. Noblesse oblige, eh? Deigning to share such thoroughly obvious observations... Golly, man... You really are the swellest.

[You know the smarmy little jackass is still checking these comments every day ('Well alright then... Let's see who's thinking about my big penis TODAY...)]

But... I digress.
